channel.title: Year in Review on The Majority
channel.description: Recent content in Year in Review on The Majority

item.title: The Majority: 2020 in review
item.description: Hi, welcome to my review of The Majority's highlights of 2020, AKA The year of staying at home and arguing with people on the internet. In May, after seeing the frustration and anger of NO voters, as the SNP continued to defy the 2014 referendum result and the lack of effective opposition, I decided to start The Majority. I contacted Ian Lakin (@HighlandChief) through Twitter, to ask advice on my plan to create a new anti-Nationalist media.
